title: Whats up with the city of Wilmington and getting water leaks fixed.  There is water bubbling up at the corner of North 12th St and Market St as well as at South 13th and Market St under the pedestrian overpass. One leak I have seen for at least a month and the other 4 months. I have called to report the leaks and the only solution I have seen is putting out orange cones.
text: Here's a link to the answer to your question. http://www.myreporter.com/?p=17106
